about_the_game:
Explore and discover a peaceful idle fishing game set on a marooned island in the middle of nowhere. Recruit a team of shipwrecked heroes, plunge into the deep seas, and fish your way from rags to riches.



  • A fully fledged peaceful idle fishing game that is both single and multiplayer, with a charming cast of characters and diverse stories
  • An easy to learn, hard to master fishing system with over 50+ different types of fish, loot, and surprises to hook up on your rod
  • Friendly townspeople and traveling merchants give rewarding quests and sell fascinating goods
  • Over 2 hours of original music with beautiful orchestrated piano and catchy beats
  • Cake

The controls are simple and accessible - moving, interacting, and fishing - but with layers of expressive depth to master, where the pro fishermen are separated from the casuals. New and better equipment will help you to uncover the mysteries of the sea and brave your way to the realm of fishing legends.

Time to fish yourself a new story.

name: Fishori

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
